Description:
KEY REQUIREMENTSPartly qualified in CA Sri Lanka, ACCA, CIMA or fully qualified in AAT.
Competency in credit management, cash, cheque and credit card clearing process in SAP.
Minimum 5- year experience in the similar capacity.
Good understanding of clearing process, bank reconciliation process and credit management.
Good team player who can coordinate sales admin team, cashiers and other internal customers.Job Details
